availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, confectioner. Native of Scotland. Married to John Boyle. Mother of Anna Boyle and Margaret Boyle. Resident of Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky in 1850. Confectioner in Covington in 1860. Confectioner in Covington in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 250B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 621.
Williams' Cincinnati Directory for 1861 (Cincinnati: Williams & Co., 1861), 418.
"Deaths," The Cincinnati Enquirer (Cincinnati, Ohio), April 2, 1880, p. 5.
